GULF OF GUINEA.
DNC 01.
1. M/V ATTACKED IN 03-29.99N 003-50.17E AT
   302100Z APR. VESSELS ARE ADVISED TO KEEP
   CLEAR OF THIS POSITION AND TO EXERCISE
   EXTREME CAUTION. REPORTS TO IMB PIRACY
   REPORTING CENTER, PHONE: 603 2031 0014,
   603 2078 5763, FAX: 603 2078 5769,
   E-MAIL: IMBKL@ICC-CCS.ORG,
   PIRACY@ICC-CCS.ORG.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 072204Z MAY 20.
